abstract: Skeptics were drowned out by the marketing campaign for Microsoft’s operating system on the eve of its arrival.
snippet: Skeptics were drowned out by the marketing campaign for Microsoft’s operating system on the eve of its arrival.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft’s power in the technology industry, some analysts insist, is waning. It faces a host of rivals from a reinvigorated Apple on the desktop to Web-based challengers like Google, delivering services and software online.

headline.main: First the Wait for Microsoft Vista; Now the Marketing Barrage
headline.print_headline: First the Wait for Microsoft Vista; Now the Marketing Barrage

abstract: Software vulnerabilities are bought and sold online, both by legitimate security companies and by thieves.
snippet: Software vulnerabilities are bought and sold online, both by legitimate security companies and by thieves.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft says its new operating system, Windows Vista, is the most secure in the company’s history. Now the bounty hunters will test just how secure it is.

headline.main: A Lively Market, Legal and Not, for Software Bugs
headline.print_headline: A Lively Market, Legal and Not, for Software Bugs

abstract: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 29  The Coast Guard is searching for a computer scientist from Microsoft who left for a daylong sailing trip off the coast of San Francisco on Sunday and did not return.

headline.main: A Researcher for Microsoft Is Reported Missing at Sea
headline.print_headline: A Researcher For Microsoft Is Reported Missing at Sea
